class pybodytrack.pose_estimators.yolo_processor.YoloProcessor(model_path=None, device='cpu')¶

Bases: object

Pose detector using YOLOv8-Pose from Ultralytics.

get_standard_landmarks()¶

Devuelve los landmarks estándar de YOLO

process(frame, selected_landmarks=None)¶

Process the frame using the model and draw only the selected landmarks and connections.

Parameters:

  • frame – The input image.

  • selected_landmarks (list, optional) – List of landmark names (strings) to draw. If None, all landmarks are drawn.

Returns:

A dictionary with the detected landmarks. frame: The frame with the drawn keypoints and connections.

Return type:

data
